data.title: Sarah James and Ben Tobin named Co-Leaders of Arts + Culture Practice
data.meta_description: Sarah James and Ben Tobin are named Co-Leaders of Isaacson, Miller's Arts + Culture practice.
data.text:
Isaacson, Miller is pleased to announce Sarah James and Ben Tobin as the new co-leaders of the firmâ€™s Arts + Culture practice. Together, Sarah and Ben bring decades of experience placing successful leaders in visual and performing arts organizations as well as colleges and schools of architecture, art, design, and music. In addition to offering clients a depth of knowledge and comprehensive networks, they work to bring a personal and professional commitment to diversity, equity, inclusion, and accessibility to each assignment.

Over the past several years, Sheryl Ash and Anita Tien have co-led the practice. We are grateful for their dedication to growing the practice, leading noteworthy searches and further deepening our expertise across independent schools of art and design, independent performing arts conservatories and schools, multi-arts colleges in higher education, and historical museums. We are delighted they will remain active in the practice.
